content: A new proposal has been announced: MCP: Embed the hir_id of the _awaited expression_ into the DesugaringKind #413. It will be announced at the next meeting to try and draw attention to it, but usually MCPs are not discussed during triage meetings. If you think this would benefit from discussion amongst the team, consider proposing a design meeting.
The associated GitHub issue has been renamed. Renaming this Zulip topic.
@T-compiler: Proposal #413 has been seconded, and will be approved in 10 days if no objections are raised.
Makes sense to me modulo what perf says, but that shouldn't block this MCP
